mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT M1.*, ROWNUM RN FROM (SELECT * FROM MEETING WHERE USER_NO = #{param2} AND ON_HIDE = 0 ORDER BY MEETING_NO DESC) M1 ) M2 FULL OUTER JOIN USERS U ON M2.USER_NO = U.USER_NO FULL OUTER JOIN EXERCISE E ON M2.EXERCISE_NO = E.EXERCISE_NO FULL OUTER JOIN PHOTO P ON M2.meeting_no = P.photo_referer_no FULL OUTER JOIN LOCATION1 L1 ON U.LOCATION1_NO = L1.LOCATION1_NO FULL OUTER JOIN LOCATION2 L2 ON U.LOCATION2_NO = L2.LOCATION2_NO WHERE RN BETWEEN (#{param1}*6-5) AND (#{param1}*6)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEETING WHERE USER_NO = #{user_no} AND ON_HIDE = 0

SELECT * FROM MEETING M FULL OUTER JOIN LOCATION1 L1 ON M.LOCATION1_NO = L1.LOCATION1_NO FULL OUTER JOIN LOCATION2 L2 ON M.LOCATION2_NO = L2.LOCATION2_NO FULL OUTER JOIN PHOTO P ON M.meeting_no = P.photo_referer_no WHERE M.MEETING_NO = #{meeting_no}

SELECT * FROM USERS U FULL OUTER JOIN TRAINER_INFO T ON U.USER_NO = T.USER_NO FULL OUTER JOIN LOCATION1 L1 ON U.LOCATION1_NO = L1.LOCATION1_NO FULL OUTER JOIN LOCATION2 L2 ON U.LOCATION2_NO = L2.LOCATION2_NO WHERE U.USER_NO = #{user_no}
